Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah and Rohit Sharma starred as India pummelled Pakistan with almost 20 overs to spare
Shubman Gill scored 16 from 11 balls before being dismissed by Afridi
Virat Kohli scored 16 from 17 balls and was dismissed by Hasan
Rohit Sharma scored 86 from 63 balls with six sixes
Pakistan collapsed from 155/2 to 191 all out in 13.1 overs
India needed 192 to win and achieved it with 117 balls remaining
Pre-Game Insights: India captain Rohit Sharma spoke about the importance of the bowlers setting the game up and restricting Pakistan to 190
Pakistan captain Babar Azam admitted that their collapse from 155/2 to 191 all out was a big issue
Jasprit Bumrah reflected on his ability to analyze conditions and bowl effectively
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised the team's performance and emphasized the need to stay balanced in the tournament
Babar Azam acknowledged that their bowling in the middle overs was not up to the mark
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shreyas Iyer scored a half-century off 53 balls
KL Rahul averaged over 100 in his last 10 ODIs going back to the Asia Cup
Rohit Sharma's six sixes in 63 balls
